00181 #ifdef _USE_GSSRPC
00182 #define SVCAUTH_PRIVATE(auth) \
00183         (*(struct svc_rpc_gss_data **)&(auth)->svc_ah_private)
00184  
00185 struct svc_rpc_gss_data {
00186       bool_t                  established;    /* context established */
00187       gss_ctx_id_t            ctx;            /* context id */
00188       struct rpc_gss_sec      sec;            /* security triple */
00189       gss_buffer_desc         cname;          /* GSS client name */
00190       u_int                   seq;            /* sequence number */
00191       u_int                   win;            /* sequence window */
00192       u_int                   seqlast;        /* last sequence number */
00193       uint32_t                seqmask;        /* bitmask of seqnums */
00194       gss_name_t              client_name;    /* unparsed name string */
00195       gss_buffer_desc         checksum;       /* so we can free it */
00196     };
00197 
00198 #endif 
00199 
00200 const char * Rpc_gss_svc_name[] = { "no name", "RPCSEC_GSS_SVC_NONE", "RPCSEC_GSS_SVC_INTEGRITY", "RPCSEC_GSS_SVC_PRIVACY" } ;

00203 static void split_credname( char * credname, char * username, char * domainname )
00204 {
00205    char * piter = NULL ;
00206    int    pos   = 0 ;
00207 
00208    /* Cred Name is "name@DOMAIN" */
00209    for( piter = credname ; *piter != '@' && *piter != '\0' ; pos++, piter++) ;
00210 
00211    strncpy( username, credname, pos ) ;
00212    username[pos] = '\0' ;
00213    strcpy( domainname, piter+1 ) ;
00214 }

00217 
00231 static void convert_gss_status2str( char * str, OM_uint32 maj_stat, OM_uint32 min_stat)
00232 {
00233         OM_uint32 min;
00234         gss_buffer_desc msg;
00235         int msg_ctx = 0;
00236         FILE * tmplog ;
00237 
00238         gss_display_status(&min, maj_stat, GSS_C_GSS_CODE, GSS_C_NULL_OID,
00239                            &msg_ctx, &msg);
00240         sprintf( str, "GSS_CODE=%s - ", (char *)msg.value);
00241         gss_release_buffer( &min, &msg);
00242 
00243         gss_display_status(&min, min_stat, GSS_C_MECH_CODE, GSS_C_NULL_OID, &msg_ctx, &msg);
00244         sprintf( str, "MECH_CODE=%s\n", (char *)msg.value);
00245         gss_release_buffer(&min, &msg);
00246 } /* convert_gss_status2str */
00247 #endif

00261 exportlist_t * nfs_Get_export_by_id( exportlist_t * exportroot, unsigned short exportid )
00262 {
00263   exportlist_t * piter ;
00264   int found = 0 ;
00265   
00266   for( piter = exportroot ; piter != NULL ; piter = piter->next )
00267     {
00268       if( piter->id == exportid )
00269         {
00270           found = 1 ;
00271           break ;
00272         }
00273     } /* for */
00274   
00275   if( found == 0 ) 
00276     return NULL ;
00277   else
00278     return piter ;
00279 } /* nfs_Get_export_by_id */

00295 int nfs_build_fsal_context( struct svc_req            * ptr_req, 
00296                             exportlist_client_entry_t * pexport_client, 
00297                             exportlist_t              * pexport,
00298                             fsal_op_context_t         * pcontext ) 
00299 {
00300   struct authunix_parms  * punix_creds       = NULL ;
00301 #ifdef _USE_GSSRPC
00302   struct svc_rpc_gss_data * gd = NULL ;
00303   gss_buffer_desc           oidbuff ;
00304   OM_uint32                 maj_stat = 0 ;
00305   OM_uint32                 min_stat = 0 ;
00306   char                      username[MAXNAMLEN] ;
00307   char                      domainname[MAXNAMLEN] ;
00308 #endif
00309   fsal_status_t             fsal_status ;
00310   uid_t                     caller_uid        = 0 ;
00311   gid_t                     caller_gid        = 0 ;
00312   unsigned int              caller_glen       = 0 ;
00313   gid_t                   * caller_garray     = NULL ;
00314   unsigned int              rpcxid            = 0 ;
00315   
00316   char * ptr ;
00317  
00318   rpcxid = get_rpc_xid( ptr_req ) ;
00319 
00320   switch( ptr_req->rq_cred.oa_flavor )
00321     {
00322     case AUTH_NONE:
00323       /* Nothing to be done here... */
00324 #ifdef _DEBUG_DISPATCH
00325       DisplayLogLevel( NIV_FULL_DEBUG, "NFS DISPATCH: Request xid=%u has authentication AUTH_NONE", rpcxid ) ;
00326 #endif
00327       break ;
00328       
00329     case AUTH_UNIX:
00330 #ifdef _DEBUG_DISPATCH
00331       DisplayLogLevel( NIV_FULL_DEBUG, "NFS DISPATCH: Request xid=%u has authentication AUTH_UNIX", rpcxid ) ;
00332 #endif
00333       /* We map the rq_cred to Authunix_parms */
00334       punix_creds = (struct authunix_parms *)ptr_req->rq_clntcred ;
00335       
00336       /* Get the uid/gid couple */
00337       caller_uid    = punix_creds->aup_uid ;
00338       caller_gid    = punix_creds->aup_gid ;
00339       caller_glen   = punix_creds->aup_len ;
00340       caller_garray = punix_creds->aup_gids ;
00341       
00342       break ;
00343 
00344 #ifdef _USE_GSSRPC
00345     case RPCSEC_GSS:
00346 #ifndef _DEBUG_DISPATCH
00347       DisplayLogLevel( NIV_FULL_DEBUG, "NFS DISPATCH: Request xid=%u has authentication AUTH_UNIX", rpcxid ) ;
00348 #endif
00349       /* Get the gss data to process them */
00350       gd = SVCAUTH_PRIVATE(ptr_req->rq_xprt->xp_auth);
00351      
00352 #ifdef _DEBUG_RPCSEC_GSS 
00353       printf( "----> RPCSEC_GSS svc=%u RPCSEC_GSS_SVC_NONE=%u RPCSEC_GSS_SVC_INTEGRITY=%u RPCSEC_GSS_SVC_PRIVACY=%u\n", 
00354                   gd->sec.svc, RPCSEC_GSS_SVC_NONE, RPCSEC_GSS_SVC_INTEGRITY, RPCSEC_GSS_SVC_PRIVACY ) ;
00355 
00356 
00357       memcpy( &ptr,  (void *)gd->ctx+4, 4 ) ;
00358       printf( "----> Client=%s length=%u  Qop=%u established=%u gss_ctx_id=%p|%p\n", 
00359               (char *)gd->cname.value, gd->cname.length, gd->established, gd->sec.qop, gd->ctx, ptr ) ;
00360 #endif
00361  
00362       if( ( maj_stat = gss_oid_to_str( &min_stat, 
00363                                        gd->sec.mech,  
00364                                        &oidbuff ) ) != GSS_S_COMPLETE )
00365         {
00366             fprintf( stderr, "Erreur de gss_oid_to_str: %u|%u\n", maj_stat, min_stat ) ;
00367             exit( 1 ) ; 
00368         }
00369 
00370 
00371 #ifdef _DEBUG_RPCSEC_GSS 
00372       printf( "----> Client mech=%s len=%u\n", (char *)oidbuff.value, oidbuff.length ) ;
00373 #endif
00374 
00375       /* Je fais le menage derriere moi */
00376       (void)gss_release_buffer( &min_stat, &oidbuff ) ;
00377 
00378       split_credname( (char *)gd->cname.value, username, domainname ) ;
00379     
00380 #ifdef _DEBUG_RPCSEC_GSS 
00381       printf( "----> User=%s Domain=%s\n", username, domainname ) ; 
00382 #endif
00383    
00384       /* Convert to uid */ 
00385       if( !name2uid( username, &caller_uid ) )  
00386         return FALSE ;
00387 
00388      if( uidgidmap_get( caller_uid, &caller_gid ) != ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS )
00389        {
00390           DisplayLogLevel( NIV_MAJOR, "NFS_DISPATCH: FAILURE: Could not resolve uidgid map for %u", caller_uid ) ;
00391           caller_gid = -1 ;
00392        }
00393 
00394 #ifdef _DEBUG_RPCSEC_GSS 
00395       printf( "----> Uid=%u Gid=%u\n", (unsigned int)caller_uid, (unsigned int)caller_gid ) ;
00396 #endif
00397       caller_glen   = 0 ;
00398       caller_garray = 0 ;
00399 
00400       break ;
00401 #endif /* _USE_GSSRPC */
00402      
00403     default:
00404 #ifdef _DEBUG_DISPATCH
00405       DisplayLogLevel( NIV_FULL_DEBUG, "NFS DISPATCH: FAILURE : Request xid=%u, has unsupported authentication %d", 
00406                        rpcxid, ptr_req->rq_cred.oa_flavor ) ;
00407 #endif
00408       /* Reject the request for weak authentication and return to worker */
00409       return FALSE ;
00410       
00411       break ;
00412     } /* switch( ptr_req->rq_cred.oa_flavor ) */
00413  
00414   /* Do we have root access ? */
00415   if( ( caller_uid == 0 ) && !( pexport_client->options & EXPORT_OPTION_ROOT) )
00416     caller_uid = -2 ;
00417 
00418   /* Build the credentials */
00419   fsal_status = FSAL_GetClientContext( pcontext,
00420                                        &pexport->FS_export_context,
00421                                        caller_uid,
00422                                        caller_gid,
00423                                        caller_garray,
00424                                        caller_glen);
00425 
00426   if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) )
00427     {
00428       DisplayLogLevel( NIV_EVENT,
00429                        "NFS DISPATCHER: FAILURE: Could not get credentials for (uid=%d,gid=%d), fsal error=(%d,%d)",
00430                        caller_uid,  caller_gid,
00431                        fsal_status.major, fsal_status.minor ) ;
00432       return FALSE ;
00433     }
00434 #ifdef _DEBUG_DISPATCH
00435   else
00436     DisplayLogLevel( NIV_DEBUG, "NFS DISPATCHER: FSAL Cred acquired for (uid=%d,gid=%d)",
00437                      caller_uid,  caller_gid ) ;
00438 #endif
00439  
00440   return TRUE ;
00441 } /* nfs_build_fsal_context */
00442 
00453 int nfs_compare_clientcred( nfs_client_cred_t * pcred1,  nfs_client_cred_t * pcred2 )
00454 {
00455    if( pcred1 == NULL ) return FALSE ;
00456    if( pcred2 == NULL ) return FALSE ;
00457 
00458    if( pcred1->flavor != pcred2->flavor ) return FALSE ;
00459 
00460    if( pcred1->length != pcred2->length ) return FALSE ;
00461 
00462    switch( pcred1->flavor ) 
00463     {
00464         case AUTH_UNIX:
00465                 if( pcred1->auth_union.auth_unix.aup_uid  != pcred2->auth_union.auth_unix.aup_uid ) return FALSE ;
00466                 if( pcred1->auth_union.auth_unix.aup_gid  != pcred2->auth_union.auth_unix.aup_gid ) return FALSE ;
00467                 if( pcred1->auth_union.auth_unix.aup_time != pcred2->auth_union.auth_unix.aup_time ) return FALSE ;
00468                 break ;
00469 
00470         default:
00471                 if( memcmp( &pcred1->auth_union, &pcred2->auth_union, pcred1->length ) ) return FALSE ;
00472                 break ;
00473     }
00474 
00475 
00476    /* If this point is reach, structures are the same */
00477    return TRUE ;
00478 } /* nfs_compare_clientcred */
00479 
00480 
00481 int nfs_rpc_req2client_cred( struct svc_req * reqp, nfs_client_cred_t * pcred )
00482 { 
00483   /* Structure for managing basic AUTH_UNIX authentication */
00484   struct authunix_parms  * aup = NULL ;
00485 
00486   /* Stuff needed for managing RPCSEC_GSS */
00487 #ifdef _HAVE_GSSAPI
00488   gss_buffer_desc           mechname;
00489   gss_buffer_desc           clientname ;
00490   OM_uint32                 maj_stat = 0 ;
00491   OM_uint32                 min_stat = 0 ;
00492 #ifdef _USE_GSSRPC
00493   struct svc_rpc_gss_data * gd = NULL ;
00494 #endif
00495   gss_buffer_desc           oidbuff ;
00496   char                      errbuff[1024] ;
00497 #endif
00498 
00499    if( reqp== NULL || pcred == NULL )
00500         return -1 ;
00501 
00502    pcred->flavor = reqp->rq_cred.oa_flavor ;
00503    pcred->length = reqp->rq_cred.oa_length ;
00504 
00505    switch( reqp->rq_cred.oa_flavor )
00506     {
00507         case AUTH_NONE:
00508            /* Do nothing... because there seems like nothing is to be done... */
00509            break ;
00510 
00511         case AUTH_UNIX:
00512            aup = (struct authunix_parms *)(reqp->rq_clntcred);
00513 
00514            pcred->auth_union.auth_unix.aup_uid = aup->aup_uid ;
00515            pcred->auth_union.auth_unix.aup_gid = aup->aup_gid ;
00516            pcred->auth_union.auth_unix.aup_time = aup->aup_time ;
00517 
00518            break ;
00519 
00520 #ifdef _USE_GSSRPC
00521         case RPCSEC_GSS:
00522            /* Extract the information from the RPCSEC_GSS opaque structure */
00523            gd = SVCAUTH_PRIVATE(reqp->rq_xprt->xp_auth);
00524 
00525            pcred->auth_union.auth_gss.svc            = (unsigned int)(gd->sec.svc) ;
00526            pcred->auth_union.auth_gss.qop            = (unsigned int)(gd->sec.qop) ;
00527            pcred->auth_union.auth_gss.gss_context_id = gd->ctx ;
00528            strncpy( pcred->auth_union.auth_gss.cname, gd->cname.value, NFS_CLIENT_NAME_LEN ) ;
00529 
00530            if( ( maj_stat = gss_oid_to_str( &min_stat, 
00531                                             gd->sec.mech,  
00532                                             &oidbuff ) ) != GSS_S_COMPLETE )
00533              {
00534                 convert_gss_status2str( errbuff, maj_stat, min_stat) ;
00535                 DisplayLog( "GSSAPI ERROR: %u|%u = %s", maj_stat, min_stat, errbuff ) ;
00536                 return -1 ; 
00537              }
00538            strncpy( pcred->auth_union.auth_gss.stroid, oidbuff.value, NFS_CLIENT_NAME_LEN ) ;
00539  
00540            /* Je fais le menage derriere moi */
00541            (void)gss_release_buffer( &min_stat, &oidbuff ) ;
00542            break ;
00543 #endif
00544 
00545         default:
00546            /* Unsupported authentication flavour */
00547            return -1 ;
00548            break ;
00549     }
00550 
00551   return 1 ; 
00552 } /* nfs_rpc_req2client_cred */
Generated on Tue Mar 31 14:37:16 2009 for Support routines layer by  1.5.7.1
